mapper.select: select todo_no ,t.pr_no ,t.emp_no ,todo_title ,todo_startdate ,todo_enddate ,todo_content ,t.status ,pr_title from todo t join project p on p.pr_no = t.pr_no where t.emp_no = #{empNo} and pr_enddate > to_char(sysdate, 'mm/dd/yyyy')

select p.pr_no ,pr_title , (select count(*) from todo t where t.pr_no = p.pr_no and t.status = 'W') as W , (select count(*) from todo t where t.pr_no = p.pr_no and t.status = 'Y') as Y , (select count(*) from todo t where t.pr_no = p.pr_no and t.status = 'O') as O , (select count(*) from todo t where t.pr_no = p.pr_no and t.status = 'L') as L , (select count(*) from todo t where t.pr_no = p.pr_no and t.status = 'N') as N from project p join prmember pr on pr.pr_no = p.pr_no where pr.emp_no = #{empNo} and pr_enddate > to_char(sysdate, 'mm/dd/yyyy')
